About

A scrim (short for "scrimmage") is a practice match between competitive teams or players. These matches are typically organized privately, outside of official tournaments, and are meant to refine skills, develop strategies, and experiment with team compositions in a controlled but competitive environment.

Mobile Legends

Join fast-paced 5v5 MOBA battles. Choose from a variety of heroes, strategize with your team, and outplay your opponents in quick matches.

Call of Duty
Mobile

Experience console-quality warfare with various multiplayer modes, including team deathmatch and battle royale. Customize loadouts, unlock characters, and compete in fast-paced matches.

Honor of Kings

Engage in 5v5 battles in this popular MOBA game. Choose from a diverse roster of heroes, each with unique abilities, and work together to destroy the enemy's core.

Valorant

A tactical FPS where players use precise gunplay and unique agent abilities in 5v5 matches. Combine strategy and skill to outsmart opponents and secure victory.

PUBG

Survive on a massive map by scavenging weapons and supplies. Fight to be the last player or team standing in this intense and strategic battle royale game.

League of Legends

Form two teams of five champions and battle to destroy the enemy Nexus in this classic MOBA. With a vast roster of champions and deep strategic gameplay, LoL remains a cornerstone of the genre.

About

A scrim (short for "scrimmage") is a practice match between competitive teams or players. These matches are typically organized privately, outside of official tournaments, and are meant to refine skills, develop strategies, and experiment with team compositions in a controlled but competitive environment.
